name: x-attack-3
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s Attack by three stages. This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Raises Attack by three stages in battle. Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text.sun_moon: It drastically raises the Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: It drastically raises the Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: It drastically raises the Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
